changes: Implemented dual torpedo firing from port and starboard positions

patterns_discovered: Dynamic vector transformation based on camera and object orientation
gotchas_discovered: Need to apply both pitch and yaw quaternions for accurate positioning
Handling different firing perspectives (forward vs aft view)

approach_outcome.key_achievement: Implemented accurate dual torpedo firing with rotational awareness

recommendations: Consider extracting offset calculation logic into a separate method
Add comments explaining quaternion rotation complexity

Add error handling for extreme rotation scenarios
